timeline.author: immmus
immmus

replies.bodyText: @immmus I was thinking about this, I think that I need to catch this error around the validatePaging and re throw / change the org.odpi.openmetadata.commonservices.ffdc.exception to a Subject area invalid parameter Exception. Do you agree?
replies.author: davidradl

timeline.author: immmus

replies.bodyText: I have raised issue #3929 to be more consistent with the use of InvalidParameterException(s) and only use the common one
replies.author: davidradl

timeline.author: immmus

replies.bodyText: The problem is that there is already an InvalidParameterExcpetion used by this class which is why I needed to qualify this one with the package. I think the answer is to remove the SubjectArea InvalidParameterException and replace it with the common one and use the InvalidParameterHandler more pervasively int the subject area code. @immmus given this, I suggest we merge this pr as is and then address this issue in an new Git issue
replies.author: davidradl

timeline.bodyText:
I really don't like how methods like this are written. But, unfortunately, I do not have time to show you how I would have done it ...
I am very sorry about this ...
timeline.author: immmus
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -423,4 +412,95 @@ private void updateAttributes(Category currentCategory, Category newTerm) { return response; } + + /** + * Get the terms that are categorized by this Category + * + * @param userId unique identifier for requesting user, under which the request is performed + * @param guid guid of the category to get terms + * @param termHandler term handler + * @param startingFrom initial position in the stored list. + * @param pageSize maximum number of definitions to return on this call. + * @return A list of terms is categorized by this Category + * when not successful the following Exception responses can occur + *
    + *
  • UserNotAuthorizedException the requesting user is not authorized to issue this request.
    • + *
  • InvalidParameterException one of the parameters is null or invalid.
    • + *
  • PropertyServerException Property server exception.
    • + *
+ * */ + public SubjectAreaOMASAPIResponse getCategorizedTerms(String userId, String guid, SubjectAreaTermHandler termHandler, int startingFrom, Integer pageSize) {

replies.bodyText: I have to approve this because I have no free time right now, but for you this is an urgent change.
replies.author: immmus

replies.bodyText: Thanks for your understanding @immmus. I am interested in how you would prefer the methods to be written.
replies.author: davidradl
